description:
Say hello t the lovely Sakura Kinomoto? She`s in my 4th grade class and she`s amazing. She lives with her father, who`s a college professor, and her brother Toya, who`s in high school. Her mother Nadeshiko, died when Sakura was only three years old.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sakura and The Mysterious Magic Book
Sakura e o Misterioso Livro Mágico
Sakura to Fushigi na Mahou no Hon
ซากุระกับหนังสือเวทย์มนต์มหัศจรรย์
さくらと不思議な魔法の本
